mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MY_BASKET USING DUAL ON(PRODUCT_ID = #{product_Id} AND USER_ID = #{user_Id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CNT = CNT + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID, CNT) VALUES (#{product_Id}, #{user_Id}, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MY_BASKET WHERE USER_ID = #{user_Id} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{product_Id}
mapper.select: SELECT E.NAME AS STORENAME, A.ID AS PRODUCT_ID, A.NAME AS PRODUCTNAME , A.PRICESELL AS PRICE , A.TEXTTIP AS VALID, C.NAME AS CATEGORY, (A.STOCKVOLUME + B.UNITS) AS STOCK, (CASE WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 > 360 THEN A.PRICESELL WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 60 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.5 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 120 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.6 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 180 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.7 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 240 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.8 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 300 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.85 WHEN (TO_DATE(A.TEXTTIP, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')) *24*60 <= 360 THEN A.PRICESELL * 0.9 END) AS DISCOUNTPRICE, A.IMAGE AS IMAGE, Z.CNT AS CNT FROM PRODUCTS A JOIN STOCKCURRENT B ON(A.ID = B.PRODUCT) JOIN CATEGORIES C ON(A.CATEGORY = C.ID) JOIN LOCATIONS E ON(E.ID = B.LOCATION) JOIN MY_BASKET Z ON (A.ID = Z.PRODUCT_ID) WHERE Z.USER_ID = #{user_Id}
SELECT B.NAME, A.CNT, B.PRICESELL FROM MY_BASKET A JOIN PRODUCTS B ON (A.PRODUCT_ID = B.ID) WHERE USER_ID = #{user_Id}
